metadata.feature_description: Interface for selecting analytics time periods and date ranges for all analytics views

steps.action: Login as host user and navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard
steps.expected: Dashboard menu should expand showing Site Analytics and Community Analytics options
steps.actual: Dashboard menu expanded correctly showing both options

steps.action: Click on Community Analytics in the Dashboard menu
steps.expected: Community Analytics panel should open with date period selector
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel failed to load. JavaScript error occurred: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init (social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025)

issues: Critical JavaScript error prevents Community Analytics module from initializing: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Select predefined periods (day, week, month, year)

steps.action: Attempt to access Community Analytics date selector
steps.expected: Date selector should be visible with Day, Week, Month, Year options
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Test blocked by module initialization failure - utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Attempt to access Community Analytics custom date picker
steps.expected: Custom date range calendar should be accessible
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Test blocked by module initialization failure - utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Attempt to test date range validation in Community Analytics
steps.expected: Start date should be limited by end date and vice versa
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Test blocked by module initialization failure - utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Attempt to test future date prevention in Community Analytics
steps.expected: Calendar should prevent selection of dates in the future
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Test blocked by module initialization failure - utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify data updates on period change

steps.action: Attempt to test data refresh when period changes in Community Analytics
steps.expected: Analytics data should refresh when time period is changed
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Test blocked by module initialization failure - utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Attempt to test period persistence in Community Analytics
steps.expected: Selected time period should persist across different analytics tabs
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Test blocked by module initialization failure - utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

observations: Community Analytics module fails to initialize due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function
Error occurs in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025 during dashboardClass.init()
The utility object passed to the Community Analytics module is missing the serializeCustomDate function
Site Analytics module loads successfully and displays date range selector (Fri Jan 09 2026 - Fri Jan 16 2026), confirming the date selection UI works in other modules
Code review of analytics.js shows the module expects utility.serializeCustomDate() and utility.deserializeCustomDate() functions for date handling
This appears to be a dependency/configuration issue where the Community Analytics module is not receiving the complete utility object
